text: Gregory Weldon Meeks (born September 25, 1953) is an American politician serving as the U.S. Representative for (formerly in the 6th district) since 1998. He is a member of the Democratic Party. In July 2020, after the primary defeat of House Foreign Affairs Committee chairperson Eliot Engel, Meeks became chair of the committee. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African-American politicians
title: Gregory Meeks
